app.title: PKU Tools
app.description: Free tools and apps for people with PKU.

phe-search.title: Phe Search
phe-search.source: Source: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Agricultural Research Service. FoodData Central, 2019. fdc.nal.usda.gov.
phe-search.singular: Tip: Use the singular of words and short search terms.

protein-calculator.title: Protein Calculator
protein-calculator.description: Calculate approximate phe values from protein.
protein-calculator.name: Food name

own-food.title: Own Food
own-food.description: Save own food and phe values.
own-food.chart: Not enough entries for the chart.

phe-log.title: Phe Log
phe-log.description: Log phe values throughout the day.
phe-log.lock-info: Weight and Phe are changed in parallel
phe-log.save-diary: Save in Phe Diary and reset Phe Log

phe-diary.title: Phe Diary
phe-diary.description: Log phe values over several days.
phe-diary.chart: Not enough entries for the chart.
phe-diary.limit: The Phe Diary has a limit of 90 entries

amino-counter.title: Amino Counter
amino-counter.description: Count the servings of the amino acid mixture throughout the day.

help.title: Help
help.description: Help and FAQ for PKU Tools.
help.install: How can the app be installed?
help.install-p1: This is a Progressive Web App and can be installed on any device (Web, Android, iOS, Windows, Mac, Linux).
help.install-p2: For the installation button to work, this page has to be refreshed.
help.sign-in-p1: You can sign in with Google or Facebook (from the menu in the top right corner).
help.sign-in-p2: Other sign in options are not planned at the moment.
help.support: You want to support the developer of the app?
help.support-p1: All support is completely voluntary, the app is free and will probably remain so! You can buy me coffee here if you want to:
help.roadmap-p1: The app is constantly being optimized. There is an overview of planned and new major features on a (German) Trello Board at:

other-apps.title: Other Apps
other-apps.phe-rechner: German PKU app that combines calculator, pen, paper and nutrition table (~ 2017).
other-apps.pku-manager: English PKU app for searching, calculating and tracking food (~ 2018).
other-apps.simple-nutrition-calculator: General app for calculating any nutrient values (~ 2019).

about.title: About
about.sources: Sources: USDA, FoodData Central, 2019 (fdc.nal.usda.gov). & Frida Food Data, version 4, 2019 (frida.fooddata.dk).
